name: Netherlands Organisation for Applied Scientific Research TNO
goal: To connect people and knowledge to create innovations that boost the sustainable competitiveness of industry and well being of society.
interests: Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Research and innovation policies; framework programme; Horizon2020, HorizonEurope; European Structural Funds
